thread.title: Newly Minted Millionaire: Taunton Woman Knows How She'll Spend Her Payday
thread.title_full: Newly Minted Millionaire: Taunton Woman Knows How She'll Spend Her Payday

author: Josh Lanier
title: Newly Minted Millionaire: Taunton Woman Knows How She'll Spend Her Payday
text:
Cristiane Freitas, of Taunton, collected her seven-figure prize from playing the "Waves of Cash" game, a $5 scratch-off ticket. She won the third and final $1 million jackpot in that game
She took the lump sum of $650,000 (before taxes) rather than the annuity. Freitas plans to invest that money.
Freitas bought the winning ticket at Canaan Fuels, 53 Court St. in Taunton. The store get a $10,000 bonus for the sale.
